text_block_list.text: Sometime before the upcoming Selection Race――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Huuu, self-assessment finished.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: If I can keep it up like this, I might get a recommendation to a sports university. That's how it feels. It should be enough to meet expectations~

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Right, right. If I study like this, get in to a sports university, and work at a sports-related company, I can have a stable life.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Even if I choose this route, I think even the people back home would praise me. I mean, it's still a commendable future, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: But, if I choose to debut in the Twinkle Series…… once I go there, there will be no turning back.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: From then on I'll be in the world of 『Serious Uma Musume』, won't I? Dedicating their entire life to racing…… remarkable girls.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I don't really have the resolve to dedicate my life to racing. Not at all.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: But earlier, when I was competing with Top Road-chan…… when it seemed like a close match, I started to think maaaay~be I can do it too.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Because of that I'm just a liiiiiii~ttle bit concerned. Wondering what I should do. From now on.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Well, I guess~……if it seemed like I'd do well I thought it'd be okay. Do my best, run, and being happy would be nice.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah~……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……………Yeah. ……Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ueeh?
choice_data_list: From now on, always, more than anyone else

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: O-oooooh……um, well~……
choice_data_list: Expectations, and I want to believe

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Y-you'd go that far, huh~…… Ah~, Waa~, Oooh~, fine I get it……!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……I'll do my best…… in the Selection Race!
――Finally, the day of the Selection Race was here.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Today too, Trainer-san was planning to give me signals……)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (But that's too early……! We just started!)
choice_data_list: You can do it! Promising Newcomer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Oooh~, there it is……! Like I thought, it's really embarrassing~! But――)
choice_data_list: You can win! You're the best!
You can win! You're the best!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (I guess it's raising my motivation!)

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Isn't Mirako a little different today? She seems a little different from that training earlier……

text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… you're right. But…… but you know――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haa…… Haa……!

text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: ――Today's Mirako is cool.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Why am I so desperate? Did I always like running this much?)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (If I win this, I'm going to debut, huh? Training to be a pro is gonna be tough, isn't it?)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (I won't be able to go back, after this, huh? Staying up all night reading manga, I won't be able to do things like that anymore, right?)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (That person, I wonder why they're that desperate――)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (……Ahh-, for me)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I guess it's because they have expectations for me, huh……!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (……I guess I don't need to think about it too hard, huh? After all, I'm happy right now)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (So I can live up to that person's expectations, I guess…… I'll try to work a little harder!)
Hishi Miracle took first! I hurriedly rushed through the crowd of people in awe at the surprise victory.
choice_data_list: With this…… we can form a contract!!
With this…… we can form a contract!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Fu. Fufufu…… Ahaha! You don't have to be in such a hurry, I'm not going to run away.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Well, Trainer-san. You see, I don't really think I can devote my life to racing.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: That's why, I'll do my best just to 『Live up to those expectations』. ……Are you still okay with that?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: So that I can keep running, always~ ……keep those expectations coming.
choice_data_list: Of course. We're gonna win G1s!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, that might be getting a little ahead of ourselves~. Something like that, we'd probably need a miracle――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……you sure know what to say.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Aaah~, I'm just getting swept up in the moment. But――)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……If you're willing to say that much, then I'm looking forward to it, okay!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Well……I guess that's fine)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh no~, I forgot the recyclable trash again…… Ummm, gather up all the cardboard, I already threw away the magazines……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……I guess I don't need this anymore.
Hishi Miracle gathered up her college pamphlets from her bookshelf and tied them together with a string.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Alright. Next up…… guess I'll head to training~!
